title._content: G.F. Harris, Mine Superintendent of Virginia-Pocahontas Coal Company Mine #3 near Richlands, Virginia 04/1974

description._content: Original Caption: G.F. Harris, Mine Superintendent of Virginia-Pocahontas Coal Company Mine #3 near Richlands, Virginia. He Is in His Office Looking at a Map of the Mine Which Produces Metallurgical Coal for Use in Steelmaking. The Mine Is Five to Six Miles Square at the 1,200 Foot Level. Harris Is Responsible for Everything at His Mine and Reports Directly to the Company President 04/1974 U.S. National Archives’ Local Identifier: 412-DA-13947 Photographer: Corn, Jack, 1929- Subjects: Richlands (Tazewell county, Virginia, United States) inhabited place Environmental Protection Agency Project DOCUMERICA Persistent URL: arcweb.archives.gov/arc/action/ExternalIdSearch?id=556399 Repository: Still Picture Records Section, Special Media Archives Services Division (NWCS-S), National Archives at College Park, 8601 Adelphi Road, College Park, MD, 20740-6001. For information about ordering reproductions of photographs held by the Still Picture Unit, visit: www.archives.gov/research/order/still-pictures.html Reproductions may be ordered via an independent vendor. NARA maintains a list of vendors at www.archives.gov/research/order/vendors-photos-maps-dc.html Access Restrictions: Unrestricted Use Restrictions: Unrestricted
